column2: I am the more powerful ruler with the stronger army. I shall take the throne by right of conquest!
God has ordained that I shall rule over as much of this land as I can take by force!
There are some who call themselves "Emperors" of this land. Such a prideful act to rule over so many.
This realm will shatter and all vassals will be given independence!
[From.Religion.GetHighGodName] willing, I shall take battle to these heathens and show them the one true way!
